112131.content: Where is Bayley shrunk at?
112131.title: Ember Moon

1121311.content:
Bayley groans as she comes to, her eyes blur from whatever she'd been given "Fuck, that was some strong shit I just got dosed with, oh Ember I am so kicking your ass for this" she grumbles to herself, then covers her ears at the thunderous laughter that threatens to deafen her

"I'd like to see you try little girl" adrenaline gives Bayley focus, though she wishes she didn't when her vison and sky is filled with a grinning Ember Moon[https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/image...] "You're cuter than I expected, bigger too, about 3 inches instead of one" there's a slight frown before her smile returns "Guess the water diluted the formula but at least your still tiny" she laughs again

"You did this to me? Why, I've not done anything to deserve this kind of treatment?" Bayley yells as she stands, demanding an explanation

Ember shrugs her shoulders "You're right you haven't done anything to piss me off like some of the other girls, but of the people here tonight, only you have the potential to give me trouble" she explains, Bayley trying to figure out how to take what now feels like a very messed up, backhanded compliment as to her own skills

"That doesn't explain the shrinking" she states, basically repeating the previous questions

"Oh I shrunk you for fun as well as so I don't have to fight you and I can win this tournament easy. How does my sandal feel at your size, it's rather comfortable to me but I'm the big powerful giantess so I might be missing something" she teases, watching the tiny woman loose her mind when she realises she really is standing on the right sandal of her fellow Diva

"W-w-w-what do you have planned for me? Crush me like a bug?" she asks, cursing the slight stutter caused by fear before swallowing it down, for once Ember's thunderous laughs makes her feel slightly better

"There's no fun in that, if that was all I wanted to do I wouldn't have waited for you to wake up, instead you're going to stick with me for the evening, getting a front row seat to my victory, Well front row may be the wrong words for it" she stands up fully and Bayley watches her slip her left foot into the other sandal then raise her right

'Oh shit' she thinks before running as fast as her tiny legs could carry, but Ember easily grabs her with her toes, scrunching them around her form

"You know, I feel a little bad for taking you out of the tournament so easily Bay, so it's only fair you fight for the right to avoid being crushed under my feet, or not" she teases, rubbing her toes together as well as on Bayley, then moving her to the back of her sandal and sliding the front of her foot into the shoe, her heel hovering over the now spread eagled woman like a mountain about to fall "This fight was over before it begun, time to be eclipsed by my feet" Ember says,[https://fansrule.files.wordpress.com/201...] clearly enjoying herself way too much before Bayley's vision is blacked out by her dark sole

The Diva giggles then walks from one side of the room to the other and back, as she thought Bayley was large enough to be felt but still small enough to not be a distraction, at least so far, when it came to he fights anything could happen

What next?

1) Bayley finds herself stuck to Ember's foot as the Diva moves from simple sandals to her actual fighting boots, to the shrunken woman's horror and apprehension
2) The woman's struggles start to get distracting, so Ember moves her from her feet to her ass, worried moving her to her breasts was just asking for the woman to be found, get lost or escape none of which she wanted for her little pet
3) The feel of tiny on skin is too much, leading Ember to tape Bayley to the underside of her shoe, the brunette getting crushed between the larger woman and the ground, but without an insole to cushion some of the blow
1121311.title: On Embers Sandal

112132.title: Someone else

choices: Brie's foot lands right on Nikki, crushing her...
Brie's foot just misses turning her sister into goo....
11411.content:
“Come ON, you can’t be serious about that?” Brie groaned, hearing her sister’s suggestion for the day. “Nikki, I thought we agreed we were going to take it easier today, what the hell is with that plan?” the Bella sisters has the locker room to themselves today it seemed; the pair liked coming early on days like today since it gave them more privacy to get changed and decide on their work-out goals for the day. Brie was about to protest a little more when she saw the small smirk on the corner of Nikki’s lips. Rolling her eyes, she groaned, “Nikki! You’re such a pain in the ass sometimes.” Brie grimaced and turned around to rummage through her bag for her cell phone while her sister just giggled.

“I was only teasing Brie, chill,” Nikki said, kicking her sister in the butt playfully.
Brie swatted at her sister’s shoe, pushing the tip of her toe away without looking while she continued, “You know that today’s already a pain for me. I just wanted you not to mess with me for a few hours! Is that really so much…to…Nikki?” Brie couldn’t hear her sister’s giggling anymore and braced herself, waiting for another kick to her butt or some kind of annoyance…but nothing came. “Nikki?” Brie asked, turning around. Nothing. A low, frustrated groan left Brie’s lips as the brunette rubbed her temples with the hams of her hands and whined, “Nikki! Come on, I’m not in the mood for these games!” No response. “Fine! But I’m not going to play along,” Brie called out, expecting her sister to jump out from behind one of the rows of lockers at any moment. When no answer came, Brie stamped her foot in frustration and grumbled under her breath, “Stupid…I fucking ask for one day without messing with me and she pulls this shit.”

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

“B-Brie! H-Hey! Brie, stop it! I’m here!” Nikki screamed at the top of her lungs, waving like a madwoman, “I’m heeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeere!”

THOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

“Brie! For Fuck’s sake look down!” the Bella shouted at her sister with no response…not that anyone would really blame Brie. After all…who in their right mind would be paying attention to the tiny squeak of a bug before their feet? No matter how much Nikki waved, screamed, or jumped it didn’t matter…without Brie even noticing….Nikki had become a gnat on the floor in front of her sister’s now colossal sneakered feet (https://static.sportskeeda.com/wp-conten...).

“DAMMNIT NIKKI, I DON’T HAVE TIME FOR THIS,” Brie’s voice thundered from high above as Nikki cowered below, hands pressed tight against her ears to keep them from bursting. Nikki had gone from being the big sister to the “little” sister in a split-second…actually, it was more like the “bug sister” as she found herself standing in the shadow of Brie’s sneaker. Despite her reputation as “fearless” in the ring, Nikki was clearly a few seconds away from pissing herself in freight. Her hair was a frazzled mess, her skin was pale, sweat was dripping down her forehead and for all her years of performing in front of crowds of thousands, she couldn’t help but feel like she had a series case of stage fright as her whole body vibrated with anxious energy. The tiny wrestling star felt every cell in her body begging her to turn and run while her head kept screaming at her to call for Brie one more time, like any second now her skyscraper of a sister would look down and recognize her on the floor. Despite Nikki’s wishes, Brie still seemed to be as pissed off as she was a second ago; pulling her gym-shirt on over her head, the Bella sister looked at herself in the mirror and posed a little as she grumbled to herself….

BABOOOOOOOM!

Nikki was thrown to the ground thanks to Brie swiveling on her heel to face the mirror. Her sister’s house-sized heel slammed down right in front of her, missing her by a fraction of an inch. Nikki’s face flushed bright red as she sat, shivering on the floor…in a growing, warm puddle. For the first time since she’d been a little kid…Nikki had just wet herself.

Unaware of her sister’s plight, Brie struck another pose in front of the full-length mirror and muttered to herself, “NOT TOO BAD I GUESS,” she said, switching which foot she had her weight on (https://i.pinimg.com/564x/3a/e3/02/3ae30...). “SHIT, WHY’S NIKKI HAVE TO CHOOSE TODAY TO DISAPPEAR ON ME?” Brie whined, unaware of the little droplet of liquid by her right heel…and the very familiar bug in the center of it.

As her gargantuan sister’s heel came down a fraction of an inch in front of her, Nikki finally gave in to her instincts; running on pure adrenaline, the Diva flipped onto her stomach and began sprinting in the opposite direction. It didn’t matter that it was her sister, there was no way in hell Nikki was going to die screaming for her sister’s attention at her feet. She just needed some distance! If she could put some space between herself and Brie then she’d be able to think of…a…counter…. A small thought flicked through Nikki’s mind, ‘Why did it just get darker?’ Breaking every rule of fleeing from danger, Nikki looked over her shoulder…and came face-to-foot with Brie.

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

Brie had taken just a half-step back to try and see herself a little better in the mirror. Examining herself from the side, she slowly lifted her right leg onto her toes and admired her leg…clueless that her “big” sister was trapped under the heel of her planted left foot (https://images-production.global.ssl.fas...). Swiveling on her heel, Brie looked at herself in the mirror one more time before deciding that the outfit she’d chosen for today wasn’t really the one she’d been looking for. Seeing Nikki’s bag on the other bench, Brie smirked and softly said under her breath, “She owes me for vanishing anyway~” Moving with a little skip toward it, the Bella had no clue what she’d just put her little bug-sized sister through…
THOOOOOM!....THOOOOOM!....THOOOOM!....

Ears ringing, Nikki was honestly shocked when light filled her vision again. Her stomach was twisted up in painful knots as Nikki’s body reacted to the intense anxiety the only way it knew how…the Bella sister leaned over and hurled from fright after nearly ending up as goo in her sister’s treads.

“F-Fuck…” Nikki managed to exhale, coughing on the dust and dirt that had gotten into her mouth when Brie’s heel had crashed down…knocking loose whatever dried mud had been stuck in the rubber ridges of the sneaker sole. The last few seconds had felt like they’d lasted an eternity…the wall of rubber had smashed into her face, throwing her to the floor harder than any tackle in the ring had ever managed. What had really shaken her though was the snugness of the rubber walls that flanked her; had she fallen a few inches to the left or right, Nikki knew that her sister’s foot would have torn one of her arms off. In a fraction of a second, Nikki had gone from one of the most recognizable faces in television, to a piece of dirt stuck in her sister’s sneaker sole…and just as easily, she’d fallen back onto the tile floor with other bits of filth…. Brie hadn’t heard her scream for her attention at the start, hadn’t noticed her running, and now had actually stepped on her without noticing anything. It was official…Nikki was a bug…

“HOLY SHIT, SHE TOTALLY STOLE THIS FROM ME!” Brie said, rummaging through Nikki’s bag while her “big” sister had a small existential crisis a few tiles away from her. She reclaimed her shirt and tossed it back onto the other bench, determined to find anything else that might have emigrated from her closet. After a few more moments picking through the bag, Brie figured she’d found all she was going to…though she was definitely going to talk to Nikki about taking her things when she found her again.

THOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
11411.title: From Big-Sis to Bug-Sis

1142.content: Where is she waking up tiny?
1142.title: Brie Shrunk

choices: Brie realized she needed to run toward the laces to get noticed...
Brie lose her balance and crashed back to the floor, falling unconscious...
11422.content:
Brie’s head felt like it had been split open with a rusty axe…that kind of throbbing, intense pain that only seemed to get worse with time. For Brie, it was the world’s worst alarm clock. The Bella sister had looked almost like she was dead as she laid out on the worn, leather surface of her current perch… and the throbbing pain in her head didn’t make her feel any better as consciousness returned (https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nTxj4iBaM8s/maxre...). She refused to open her eyes, sure that any light would only make the throbbing worse…instead, she began sifting through her hazy memories to try and figure out what had happened to her. The leather under her body felt smooth and worn down…but it definitely wasn’t the material for the main or practice rings. So, injury while in practice was out. She didn’t think it felt like a couch or car-seat. So post-drinking hangover was out. With the throbbing growing worse, Brie reached up to massage her temples…or she would have…if she could move her arms…. “What the fu-” Brie said, leaning up until she felt a familiar pressure on her chest that kept her from rising more than a fraction of an inch. Her head slammed back into the leather surface and Brie could have sworn she saw light before her eyes…actually…it was a light before her eyes. One that was high up in the air…it looked like the kind of light you’d see in the entrance to a house…but the scale was off. The thing looked hu-

A flash of pain surged through Brie’s head that she swore would have knocked her out again. As the pain faded, the memories began flooding back… Brie remembered now. This insanity all started a few hours ago in the gym locker room…when she suddenly found herself the size of a bug….

BABOOOM! BABOOOM! BABOOOOOOM! BABOOOOOOOOOOOM!

Brie squeaked and pressed her body against the cold metal pole that supported the bench she’d been typing her shoelaces on a mere moment ago. The beautiful Bella sister didn’t know what had happened to her or why…all she knew was that one second she’d been thinking about what she was going to do for dinner tonight…and a second later she was staring at one of the screws bolting the bench to the floor…only the metal bit was wider than she was tall! She tried her best to get her bearings, but the sudden tremors that shook Brie to her bones were the thing on her mind right now. With her arms and legs wrapped around the cold steel, she waited for King-Kong or Godzilla to suddenly appear given the strength of the quakes…what she got made her jaw drop.

GRRRRRRRNNNNNNNNN….. BABOOM! BABOOOM! BABOOOOOM! BABOOOOOOOOOOM!

“FUCK, I’M GONNA KILL WHOEVER WRACKED THE WEIGHTS THAT WAY,” a very familiar voice thundered in Brie’s ears. For Brie it seemed like this was a nightmare that she wanted desperately to wake up from…but as the tremors grew stronger, the Bella sister had her worst fear confirmed…

BABOOOOOOOOOOM!

“You’ve got to be kidding me…” Brie said, feeling like she was going to throw up.

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

The toe of a massive, white shoe slammed down just a few inches in front of Brie, knocking the tiny woman off her perch and onto the grimy tile floor. She was about to sit up when her eyes caught sight of a massive shadow coming down very quickly. Terrified, Brie balled up and braced herself…

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

Brie had been tossed up in the air and slammed back down on the tile floor in a heap. She thought it was a miracle she hadn’t broken a bone in the process, but as she slowly got up and looked in the direction of the meteor, her stomach dropped. Stretched out in front of her was a wall of grey and brown…Brie arched her head up and felt sick to her stomach…she was staring at the crotch of an exhausted, sweating Sasha (https://cdn3.whatculture.com/images/2016...). The bossy Diva looked like a true goddess to Brie…her smooth skin seemed to shimmer as the lights in the locker-room made the beads of sweat running down her body shimmer. Sasha grabbed the towel around her neck and pulled it down to dab at her face and neck; as she did, the curtain of fabric kicked up a gust of wind that sent Brie tumbling head-over-heels again (https://i.ytimg.com/vi/RJT3VYHXwI8/maxre...). Brie slid to a stop, the skin on her stomach burning from the friction…her heart was hammering like crazy as she pushed herself back onto her back, exhausted (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/cb/1c/c2/cb1cc...). If even a towel falling could send Brie flying onto her ass like this, how the hell was she supposed to get Sasha’s attention?!

“PAIN IN THE ASS,” Sasha said, dabbing at her forehead again as she swung the towel back around her neck. She hadn’t intended to go so hard today for her workout, but given how annoyed she was because of the shitty night’s sleep she’d had, Sasha felt like the little extra might help burn off some tension. All it really did was make her too hot and tired to move. She could have sworn she felt her shorts sticking to the tile floor, but Sasha brushed the thought aside…she’d cool down here for a few minutes before getting changed to go home. Without rising from the ground, she reached behind her for her gym back and lazily began digging through it for her street clothes.

While Sasha was busy digging in her bag, one of her rivals was facing a huge trial at the toe of her right foot. Scared shitless, Brie had nervously approached the front of Sasha’s foot. She’s tried thinking of any other possible way to get found, but nothing else honestly seemed as likely to get her found than if Brie managed to get onto the vast expanse of white that was Sasha’s sneaker. If the Boss looked down just once while untying her shoes, then Brie was sure she could get her attention. The toe of Sasha’s sneaker was thankfully scuffed up enough that Brie had several handholds to choose from...but not a lot of time to get this job done. Thankfully, Sasha seemed to be staying still for now as she lazily fished through her bag for the set of street clothes she’d brought with her, but Brie didn’t know how long this peace would last. If Sasha moved this foot forward right now, Brie knew she’d end up getting crushed between the toe of Sasha’s sneaker and the metal pole. Without wasting a second, Brie began pulling herself from groove to groove, scaling the tip of Sasha’s sneaker in a solid 20 seconds; the black rubber gave way to white leather that Brie willingly threw herself against. She kissed the sneaker’s tip, thankful to be done with the first hurdle.

Brie’s break was interrupted though as Sasha groaned, “FUUUUUCK, I KNOW I PUT IT IN HERE SOMEWHERE… SHIT, FINE, I’LL FIND IT LATER.”

Brie’s eyes went wide as she looked up and immediately felt incredible empathy for any ant she’d ever found in her kitchen. She’d always wondered why the little things froze whenever she found them…now she knew why. Under the weight of Sasha’s gaze, Brie felt like she’d been frozen solid (https://i.pinimg.com/236x/8d/5f/14/8d5f1...). At least…until Sasha’s fingers passed by her and reached for the laces of the other shoe. Fear was replaced by humiliation as Brie realized she wasn’t even big enough to warrant Sasha’s attention at a glance. She’d need to fight if she wanted the giant woman to take notice of the bug-sized Bella.
11422.title: A Small Problem for Brie Bella...

114221.content:
The Bella sister looked up at the exhausted Diva who’s shoe she was currently perched upon. While Sasha was busy dealing with the laces on the neighboring shoe, Brie realized she’d need to get closer to the laces on this shoe…she was terrified by the idea that Sasha would miss her while untying this shoe…that she’d fall to the floor and be left here alone till someone else came by. Although she was exhausted from scaling the tip of Sasha’s sneaker, Brie knew she couldn’t afford to sit and rest.

Meanwhile, on the other shoe, a very tired Sasha was having more trouble than she thought getting the laces of her sneaker undone. Growling a little, she finally managed to undo the stupidly tight knot, but at the cost of ruining her manicure. She let out an exasperated moan and shook her head…she’d deal with that later. Pulling at the laces, she finally had them loosened and turned to her other foot. The Boss brushed her hair back once again and leaned forward to start untying her right sneaker when she thought she saw something moving across the toe of her sneaker. Cocking her head, Sasha rubbed her eyes and flexed her toes in their sneakers, hearing the groan of rubber…and what sounded like a very soft scream….

As Brie slammed face-first into the white leather surface of Sasha’s sneaker after the sudden undulation of the ground beneath her, she heard her co-worker-turned-titan boom from above, “WHAT THE HELL IS THAT?” Despite being in pain, Brie looked up and saw that Sasha had finally taken notice of her…with one…tiny…problem.

The massive Diva’s face contorted slightly in disgust as Brie realized that although Sasha now saw her, the giantess thought that the Bella sister was nothing more than a common bug clinging to her foot! Sasha sneered and brushed her hair aside while muttering under her breath; Brie’s heart stopped when she saw Sasha move her right hand to wipe out the insect with the pad of her thumb (http://pa1.narvii.com/5878/9e823639e6457...). Brie pissed herself and immediately began waving up at Sasha, screaming at the top of her lungs! “S-Sasha! Wait! Stop, please I’m not a bug! It’s Brie! P-Please hang on, it’s me! I’m not a bug! I’m Brie! Sasha please, don’t do this!”

THUMP!

Brie dove out of the way just in time as Sasha’s thumb came down right where she’d been a second prior. The giantess began grinding her finger back and forth, thinking she’d caught the bug…and while she wasn’t killing Brie, she’d definitely scared the Bella sister shitless. Brie flipped onto her stomach and began crawling back toward the tip of Sasha’s sneaker when the giantess withdrew her thumb and saw that she’d missed the mark.

“OOOOH NO, YOU’RE NOT GETTING AWAY FROM ME LITTLE BUG,” Sasha said, giggling as she reached forward with her index finger and thumb, ready to pinch the little bug to bits between her digits.

Brie was crying as she almost slipped on the rough leather, “Sasha! Please just let me go! I won’t bother you or anything, I’ll wait for someone else! J-Just let me go! Please don’t hurt me! Don’t hurt me, don’t hurt me, don’t hurt me! N-No! Noooooo! Sasha sto-” The air was squeezed out of Brie’s lungs as Sasha’s fingers came together, nearly crushing the tiny Bella’s ribcage in the process (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/70/b2/b9/70b2b...). Brie began wriggling like crazy as the two walls of flesh threatened to squish her at any moment. For a moment, Brie thought that this was it…Sasha was going to press her fingers together and Brie would burst like a tiny grape…no one would know what happened to her… The pressure began to build…it would be any second now, Brie thought as the pain grew more intense!

Just as she was about to pass out, Brie heard Sasha’s voice boom, “NOW LET’S SEE WHAT THE HELL KINDA FREAKY BUG YOU ARE,” as her body began to rise rapidly into the air. Before Brie knew it, she was hovering before the large brown eyes of Sasha Banks…the woman who’d nearly killed her several times now without knowing it. Brie began to cry…she’d have shouted but Sasha was still crushing her ribs; hoping beyond all hope, Brie prayed Sasha recognized the bruised Bella as something more than a bug… and her wish came true… “BRIE?!?! IS THAT REALLY YOU?! OH MY FUCKING GOD WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU?!” Sasha exclaimed (nearly deafening Brie in the process) before dropping the Bella into the palm of her free hand. Splayed out on the endless expanse of skin, Brie looked up at the…excited…face of Sasha…she was found, but the look in Sasha’s eyes wasn’t making her feel any more comfortable (https://i.ytimg.com/vi/nrWwCEKihTg/maxre...).

Brie tried to call up, but felt a sharp pain in her sides; Sasha might not have crushed her ribcage, but she definitely cracked or bruised a majority of her ribs. Still, she fought back the pain and screamed up at the top of her lungs, “I don’t know! Please! Sasha, you have to help me! I don’t think anyone knows this happened to me, please!” She almost immediately regretted saying that…but hoped Sasha was so absorbed in having a tiny person sitting in the palm of her hand that she hadn’t noticed the slip. If she had, Brie couldn’t see a trace of recognition on the billboard-sized face looming over her.

“YOU HAVE TO SPEAK UP BRIE. SORRY, YOU’RE JUST SO LITTLE! IT’S HARD TO HEAR YOU,” Sasha boomed, suddenly shifting her head to the side so her ear was facing Brie. The wave of hair whipped up a gust that knocked Brie flat on her ass again and Sasha had not even noticed. Instead, she was still digging through her bag with a free hand while she waited for Brie to answer.
Brie slowly got to her feet and stared into the dark hole of Sasha’s ear canal…she took a deep breath and hollered, “Sasha, please, I don’t know what happened to me but I need you to help me! You have to take me to a doctor or someone who’ll know what to do!” There was a brief moment of silence that hung heavily in the air. For a second, Brie thought Sasha didn’t hear her…the Bella took another deep breath and shouted, “Sasha! Please! You’re my only hope right now! You have to help m-”

THWACK! THWACK!

Brie covered her ears and curled up into a ball as the sonic assault on her hearing made her sick to her stomach. Wincing, Brie looked in the direction of the shockwaves and saw that Sasha had found her brown sandals and had dropped them on the tile floor. Each one was the size of half a football field to Brie…and that fact alone made her position that much more desperate. If Sasha said no then she’d be fucked…
114221.title: The Amazing Lace!

choices: Sasha was here to play with her new toy
1142212.content:
“Sasha!” Brie called once more, “Sasha, please!”

“I HEARD YOU, SORRY. WAS JUST THINKING IF THERE WAS ANYONE I KNEW WHO COULD HELP,” the giantess said, turning back to Brie with a smile on her face.

“S-So, that means you’ll help me?!” Brie called up, feeling her spirits soar for the first time since this whole mess began.

Little Brie was knocked down as Sasha giggled and nodded, cooing, “OF COURSE I’M GONNA HELP YOU BRIE…IF I LEFT YOU ALL ALONE YOU’D JUST GET STEPPED ON BY SOMEONE ELSE ANYWAY. WE CAN’T HAVE THAT HAPPEN,” she said as she slowly began to lower Brie down. The Bella sister was so thrilled that Sasha said she’d help that she didn’t even think to question it when Sasha tilted her hand and let Brie off on the well-worn sandals…in fact, she’d thought Sasha just did it so that she could easily lift Brie up next time. Sasha smiled down at Brie and then dug in her bag for something excitedly, giggling in spite of her efforts to keep cool. Finally, her eyes landed on what she wanted. From down below, Brie could hear the sound of something ripping as Sasha’s voice boomed, “IF ANYONE IS GONNA STEP ON YOUR TINY ASS, IT’LL BE ME…” With a speed that Brie’s mind didn’t have a second to react to, Sasha crouched low to the ground…blew Brie down with a puff of air…and slapped a small bit of medical tape down on the tiny thing. “OH YEAH…THAT’S A MUCH BETTER LOOK FOR YOU BRIE!” Sasha giggled as she watched the stunned Bella sister begin to struggle in vain against the sticky strip of tape.

“S-Sasha! Hang on! You don’t know what you’re doing! You can’t do this to me! Stop it! L-Let me go! Let me go now, you crazy fucking bitch!” Brie screamed at the top of her lungs, thrashing impotently against the tape. She was cast in the shadow of the thong of Sasha’s sandal…judging by the slight slope on her right side, Sasha had taped Brie down right next to where the ball of her foot came down…

BABOOOM!....BOOOM!....

Brie looked back and whimpered as she saw Sasha’s sneakers crash to the ground…only for her sweat-laden gym socks to be thrown over a second later. The air was now heavy with the earthy aroma of Sasha’s sweat as the giantess’ laughter thundered overhead. A shadow fell over Brie as she turned and looked to see Sasha smirking at her from on high.

“OH…I’M GONNA ENJOY THIS…” Sasha said as her soft, smooth, bare sole suddenly eclipsed Brie’s view of her face. Brie screamed at the top of her lungs, but it did nothing to slow the descent until finally…

BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

Giggling, Sasha slipped on her other sandal and flexed her toes, smirking as she felt a very tiny form squirm just to the side of the ball of her foot. Focusing on that figure, Sasha eased her weight down a little more, seeing how much she could put on Brie before she broke…and to her delight she found that the bug seemed more durable than she’d hoped…that or just to the left of the ball of her foot was enough to keep her captive from getting crushed. Flexing her toes, Sasha rose to her full height and giggled, “Oh shit, this is gonna be fun…” (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Mercedes-Kaest...). Packing her things quickly, Sasha slung her bag over her shoulder and headed for her car, excited to start learning what her toy was good for when she got it home.

While Sasha was walking toward her car, the little Diva stuck to her sandal was in a living hell. Brie couldn’t breathe…between the crushing weight that came down on her with each footfall, the thick and humid air that swirled around her, and the terror that was constricting her chest, Brie was already feeling light-headed by the time Sasha was 10 steps away from the locker room. If the weight of Sasha’s foot bearing down on her wasn’t enough to make Brie feel sick, the added weight from Sasha’s sweat soaking into Brie’s clothing was making things even worse for the little Bella bug. Each step followed the same cycle…Brie would be nearly crushed under the weight of Sasha’s body as it rolled over her…just as the weight seemed like it would become unbearable, it would lift off and she’d be given a change to catch her breath. It never lasted long though as Sasha’s foot would rise into the air and let Brie experience several G’s before finally coming to a stop that threw her against the restraint of tape as though she were clothes-lined by a seatbelt in a speeding car that came to a sudden halt. There was an unnerving moment of stillness that would let Brie examine the bottom of Sasha’s foot…the delicate ridges, the deep wrinkles that were soft and smothering, the bit of dirt that even Sasha herself would probably never notice…. Brie would be snapped out of her trance when she began to fall; her stomach jumped into her throat and she braced herself for what she knew was coming n-

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

A bone would crunch sometimes…or a muscle would be pulled or tighten in an unnatural way that would send a jolt of pain through Brie’s body. Each step Sasha took repeated this horrific cycle. Each step broke Brie in one more way. Each step marinated Brie in a mixture of Sasha’s foot sweat and fear. Each step made Brie less of a person and more of a bug… Brie began to cry and puckered her lips, planting kiss after kiss to the bottom of Sasha’s sole as she prayed the Diva would feel her offer and relent. Instead, Brie just heard the heavy metal clunk of Sasha’s car door opening. She felt the world tip sideways as Sasha swung her legs into the car…and then the heavy impact as the giantess planted her left foot on the floor and began flexing her toes. Brie might have been spared the gas pedal, but Sasha certainly hadn’t forgotten about her.

“P-Please…Please let me go Sasha,” Brie cried, giving the giantess’ sweaty sole another kiss. “I-I’ll do anything you tell me! I’ll be fun, just please don’t hurt me anymore!” Brie began to whimper, finding it hard to come up with words in her state…instead she just began kissing and dragging her tongue across the length of Sasha’s sole. The taste of salt and the tinge of dirt stayed on her tongue…a flavor she was terrified would become familiar to her. Little did Brie know though…all of her worship meant nothing. Sasha couldn’t feel a thing the tiny woman did to her sole…

BABOOOOOOM!

A tremor brought Brie back to reality as she looked around to try and figure out what her situation was. Brie didn’t know how long she’d been underfoot before she’d passed out…but here she was…taped to the insole of Sasha’s sandal and dumped in the entrance to said Diva’s home. Struggling against the restraint, Brie didn’t know that it was all for naught till a deep shadow fell over her…Sasha was back.
1142212.title: Sasha's Bella Backstabbing

11422121.content:
“YOU UP YET BRIE? COME ON, IT WASN’T THAT BAD…UNDER THERE, WUSS…” Sasha’s voice thundered as Brie suddenly found her world shifting again; Sasha had apparently knocked the sandal back upright with a simple tap of her big toe. Brie looked up to see Sasha’s imposing form loom above; the Diva was a living skyscraper and seemed to be reveling in the power it gave it her the Bella sister...at least, that’s what Brie gathered from the goosebumps she could see breaking out across Sasha’s body. Brie closed her eyes and braced herself, waiting for the suffocating, warm, weighty force of Sasha’s sole to bear down on her again…but it didn’t happen. She peeked one eye open and felt all the air in her lungs get sucked out…Sasha had crouched low…and brought her smirking face as close to Brie as possible (http://assets2.ignimgs.com/2015/04/01/sa...). “HEH…LOOK AT THAT, YOU WERE AWAKE! THEN WHY DIDN’T YOU SAY ANYTHING BRIE? I WAS GETTING WORRIED I MIGHT HAVE BROKEN YA~”

Brie tried to speak, but couldn’t find her voice…not with Sasha leaning in so close. Any time she opened her mouth, all she managed to do was let out a small cry. Obviously, not a single one of these small sounds reached Sasha’s ears, but her massive brown eyes were drinking in the look on Brie’s face. The air vibrated around the little Diva as Sasha purred a little and nibbled on her bottom lip.

Sasha giggled and tapped next to Brie on the sandal’s insole, making sure her nail came down dangerously close to the Bella’s head. “WHAT’S WRONG? CAT GOT YOUR TONGUE? YOU KNOW…WHEN YOUR BOSS TALKS TO YOU, YOU’RE SUPPOSED TO RESPOND, BRIE. DON’T TELL ME I’M GONNA HAVE TO PUNISH YOU FOR INSUBORDINATION, AM I?”

Brie whined and shook her head, trying desperately to find her voice to no avail.

Sasha sighed and rolled her eyes before saying, “LOOK BRIE, I TRIED TO BE NICE AND GIVE YOU A CHANCE, BUT IF YOU’RE NOT GOING TO WORK WITH ME, THEN I HAVE BETTER THINGS TO DO WITH MY TIME THAN TALK TO A GROSS LITTLE BUG LIKE YOU… BYE-BYE BRIE, SORRY THIS DIDN’T WORK OUT FOR YOU…” Sasha said as she raised her hand and began to bring it down on the little woman taped to her insole (https://uproxx.files.wordpress.com/2015/...).

“N-Noooooooooooooooooo! Sasha, don’t!” Brie screamed, closing her eyes and bracing for the end…there was a huge gust of wind, but not pain…no pressure. Slowly, Brie opened her eyes and squeaked as she found her face just an inch away from the palm of Sasha’s palm. The ceiling began to pull away, revealing Sasha’s smiling face.

“SEE?” Sasha teased, “FROM NOW ON, DON’T MAKE ME HAVE TO DO THIS. IF I ASK YOU A QUESTION, THEN YOU ANSWER IT. NEXT TIME I’M GONNA CRUSH YOU FOR REAL.”

Brie nodded, tears streaming down her face as she fought against the tape a little more frantically. Sasha was fucking crazy and if she couldn’t get away, Brie knew she was going to be killed. Of course, Sasha noticed the struggling and giggled at Brie’s pathetic attempt to get away. She grabbed the sandal in her hand and stood up to her full height as Brie screamed for her attention, “W-Wait! Sasha! Please, if you just let me go I won’t tell anyone about this! Y-You won’t get in trouble!” Sasha just burst out laughing and turned the insole so Brie was staring down at the ground and Sasha’s wiggling bare toes. Brie whimpered…the fall from this height was nothing to joke about. It would be like falling from the top of the Empire State Building, and in that moment, Brie was happy for the tape…till Sasha’s nails began to pick at it. “No! Sasha, please hang on! Stop it!”

“OH MY GOD! WHAT IS IT WITH YOU? ONE SECOND YOU WANT ME TO LET YOU GO AND THE NEXT YOU WANT ME TO KEEP YOU TIED DOWN? FINE…I’LL LET YOU STAY ON MY SANDAL THEN, BUT NO MORE FAVORS,” Sasha said, smirking as she saw the color drain from Brie’s face.

The Bella sister was at her wit’s end. Sasha had nearly broken her before even noticing her…it was a miracle she hadn’t died on the sandal…and now Brie had unwittingly given up her one chance at getting freed…or at least that was how Sasha was phrasing it.
“SO…I’VE GOTTA FIGURE OUT HOW THIS HAPPENED TO YOU. I MEAN, CAN YOU IMAGINE HOW MUCH FUN IT WOULD BE TO HAVE TONS OF YOU LITTLE BITCHES BUG SIZED WHERE YOU BELONG? THAT WOULD BE PERFECT! ESPECIALLY YOUR SIS…HEHE, HAVING THAT LITTLE BITCH BETWEEN MY TOES FOR THE REST OF HER LIFE…MMMMMMMM, I MEAN, YOU CAN’T GET BETTER THAN THAT,” Sasha purred, waving the sandal back and forth gently. “ACTUALLY…I GUESS HAVING YOU DO THAT COULD BE JUST AS GOOD…YEAH, WHY NOT? SOUND FUN BRIE? YOU’RE A LUCKY LITTLE BUG, I’M GONNA LET YOU HAVE THE PRIVILEDGE OF KISSING MY FOOT!”

“I-I already did that!” Brie screamed, horrified at the prospect of ending up underfoot again. Her outburst drew Sasha’s attention though as the titaness raised an eyebrow.

“DID YOU JUST YELL AT ME?” she asked, the humor draining from her face.

Whatever had been left in Brie’s bladder was now trickling down her leg as she squirmed and squeaked, “N-No, Sasha! I-I wasn’t trying to do that!”

“REALLY? BECAUSE IT SOUNDED LIKE YOU DIDN’T WANT TO KISS MY FOOT…IS THAT THE PROBLEM? YOU DON’T WANT TO KISS MY FEET?”

“I-I do!” Brie called, feeling her cheeks burn bright red.

Sasha smiled softly and giggled, “GOOD. BECAUSE THAT’S ALL YOU’RE GOOD FOR, BUG BITCH.”

THWACK!

“LICK” was the last word Brie heard before the wall of flesh that was Sasha’s foot came down on top of her. The weight nearly crushed her ribs, but just like before Brie managed to hold on. Gritting through the pain, Brie opened her mouth and began kissing and licking Sasha’s sole, whimpering from the sting of her ribs and the humiliation her new “Boss” was heaping on top of her. Opening her mouth wider, Brie began taking long, sloppy licks at the section of flesh that was put before her face…after a few moments, she was openly lapping at Brie’s foot like a kicked dog that wanted to be complimented. The tears began to flow and Brie quickly didn’t know if the salty flavor in her mouth was from her crying or Sasha’s sweat…it didn’t matter any more. She was barely worth more than the dirt she was licking off of Sasha’s foot…and that lesson was slowly being driven into her as the giantess giggled above.

Sasha smirked and looked down at her left foot where her former rival was now licking her sole…or so she assumed (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Mercedes-Kaest...). Whatever had shrank Brie had made her too small to really feel small things like that, but the knowledge alone that her competitor was now just a flea underfoot was enough to curl Sasha’s toes. The giantess slipped on her other sandal and examined herself in her bikini…she was planning to go out to the pool and sunbathe, possibly have some people over…the real question for her was about what she should do with Brie. While she pondered this question, she slowly lifted her left foot off the ground…and slammed it back down as hard as she could!

THWACK!

“No getting lazy bug! I should feel you fucking my foot if you’re serious about being my pet,” Sasha announced, smirking as she noticed a slight tickle under her sole…the threat was working. Hell, a few more stomps and Brie might actually make a halfway decent pet. Walking to the sliding glass door, Sasha felt the sun hit her body and flexed her toes as she made her choice. Brie was going to…

boom...Boom...BOOM...BOOM!..BOOM!!!

11521.content:
Terrified, you jumped back from the massive foot that had fallen out of the sky and missed you by just a few inches. Your heart jumped into your throat as you realized that you weren’t 2 inches tall…the stupid metric had been messed up. At the very most, you were only 2cm tall…and now you were less than a bug’s height while at the truly massive feet of an unaware giantess. Like the scared animal you were, you skittered away from the giantess’s foot and tried your best to get your bearings. You’d been 2 inches before…but 2cm was a whole new ballgame. The world around you now was completely alien to you at this size….

One of the most unnerving things you noticed was the level of detail you could see on the set of toes in front of you. Paige was a living monument from your perspective. You could see the blood drain from the front of her toes and her skin turn a pure white as she leaned forward on them…then you could see the pink and red flush back to life as she rolled back onto her heels. The sound of leather stretching and groaning against the twitches of her foot rang in your ears and you were having trouble keeping your balance as every little motion Paige made sent tremors through the ground. Every cell in your body was telling you that you needed to get away from the giantess before it was too la-

BABOOOOOOOOM!

“FUCK, DON’T TELL ME I FORGOT MY PHONE IN THE FUCKIN’ CAR…” Paige’s voice thundered as the giantess squatted down in front of the bench, giving you quite the view. Paige was still in her street clothes, dressed in a black tank-top, black leggings, and a pair of leather sandals with black straps that crisscrossed over her pale foot (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Saraya-Jade-Be...). Your eyes were drawn up toward her face (though you definitely took a moment to stare at her crotch as it hovered over you, threateningly)…once again you could feel just how tiny you were as you realized just how far away Paige’s head was even when squatting. The giantess continued to grumble, unaware of the peeping bug down between her feet, “I SWEAR TO GOD, IF IT’S NOT IN HERE…SHIT, REALLY? THAT’S WHERE IT IS? FUCK ME, TWO MISSED CALLS?” For Paige, it was just another day as she got past the security screen and hit the icon for her voicemail to see who she’d unintentionally blown off. She leaned forward, her knees hitting the tile floor…and nearly crushing you in the process….

THWAM!

You were laid out on your ass in a growing, warm pool as you stared at the wall of black directly in front of you. Paige’s left knee had come within an inch of crushing you and the giantess high above was none the wiser. Your ears were ringing from the explosive crack of her kneecap striking the tile floor and the constant groaning sound of the same knee stressing the fabric of her building-sized leggings. You heard a scuffling sound high above that you figured was Paige messing with her phone…but you were more focused on the knee that had nearly crushed you. Scuttling back from it, all you could think of was how to get away from the giantess you’d put so much time planning to peep on. This wasn’t a fun game or adventure anymore! It was deadly serious and already you’d nearly been killed by her without the wrestler even knowing.

Paige groaned overhead…apparently the first voicemail was either bad news or a telemarketer or something. As she listened to the second message though, even the tough Paige began to feel uncomfortable having her knees on the cool tile. While the voicemail played, she slowly began to get to her feet….

BOOM! BABOOOM! BABOOOOOOM!

“N-No!” you screamed, throwing yourself to the side in a bid to avoid one of Paige’s massive, sandal-clad feet which shot forward as the giantess stood back to her full height (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Saraya-Jade-Be...).

BABOOOOM!

You could feel the heat coming off of the massive foot that had nearly landed on you. The leather straps and base continued to groan as Paige absentmindedly flexed her toes while her mind was preoccupied. Again, instinct kicked in as you rolled away from the intimidating digit and got to your feet to run for it once more…only to fall flat on your face as you tripped over your own shoes. Skidding on the ground, the wind got knocked out of you just as Paige rolled back onto her heels and her foot began to rise. For a moment it seemed like it was going to swivel in your direction and come down on you, ending your struggle before it could really begin. Instead, her foot just moved back….

BABOOOOOOOOOOM!

Paige swiveled…

BABOOOOOOOOM!

She slowly began to walk away, giving you a view up her backside and a glance at her tight butt shaking slightly with each step her skyscraper legs took (http://i.imgur.com/4jAHD8L.gif).

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!....

The further away Paige walked, the slower your heart raced…the threat was leaving and the primal part of your brain was beginning to calm down again. Unfortunately, as the tension ratcheted down, so did the level of adrenaline in your blood. A wave of exhaustion crashed over you, threatening to knock you out cold…and even if Paige was walking away, passing out on the floor of a locker room at less than an inch tall was basically a death sentence; if a Diva didn’t crush you, you were just as likely to be killed by an ant or something.

You needed to keep awake! A meaty slap across your own face shook off some of the exhaustion, at least giving you enough focus to pick a destination: if you could get to the base of one of the bench’s legs, that could give you enough protection as long as you kept close to the bolts….

BABOOOOM!

“UGH! YOU’VE GOT TO BE KIDDING ME! THAT’S COMPLETE CRAP!” Paige’s voice thundered, waking you up the rest of the way! The giant Diva stamped her foot in frustration, sending another tremor through the ground that threatened to send you rolling head-over-heels…instead, you only managed one roll before flopping on your back. Paige was basically a force of nature to you now. Her every move made an impact on your life and a shift of her feet alone could spell your doom…she made Godzilla look like a puppy-dog…and yet… You could feel your cheeks flush bright red and your heart leap into your throat as you stared up at the living mountain that was Paige. Or…at least halfway up the mountain. Although she seemed yards away to you, Paige had barely walked a step away from the bench, and because of that she dominated your sky. Staring up her seemingly endless legs, your view of Paige was obscured by something…two somethings…Paige’s tight, toned cheeks loomed overhead threateningly (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/B6XYQ7YCcAAB...). All you could think about was how big they must be if you were up close…you were sure you could probably get lost in that valley if you weren’t careful…or if Paige was planning to sit on the floor at any point…

You snapped out of your daze as you saw Paige took a slight step back…the curve of her heel hovered imposingly before you for a few moments before she slowly lowered it down with a low rumble. Looking over your shoulder, you could see the bench leg wasn’t too far away…a short sprint and you’d be there! You’d quickly learn it was a mistake to take your eyes off of Paige.

“CHRIST, WHAT WAS THE NUMBER AGAIN?” You heard Paige’s voice thunder from above as you picked yourself up off the grimy tile floor once more. Still, your lungs froze up as you saw the awesome sight of Paige’s body (and booty) looming overhead at an impossible height. Battered and bruised as you were, you managed to reach your destination and started climbing the imperfections left in the paintjob like your life depended on it…because it did. You’d just thrown yourself over the edge and rolled to “safety” when you turned back to look at Paige. All you saw was a wall of w-

THUMP!

Paige could feel the cool steel of the bench leg against the heel of her left foot while she fished out a pen and a scrap of paper to write on from her bag to copy down the number she’d been given. It was something about a stalker seen around the facility in recent days, the number was to get in touch with the cop in charge of catching the guy in case any of the Divas had a tip.

CRACK!

You’d have screamed, but you couldn’t open your mouth any wider now that your face was mashed into Paige’s heel. Having climbed onto the leg of the bench, you had thought you were safe from Paige’s sandal-clad foot…you couldn’t have been more wrong. Almost as soon as you’d flung yourself over the side, the heel of Paige’s foot slammed into you and smashed your body into the cold metal pipe. The impact alone almost ended you…but the slight give of Paige’s skin kept you from getting crushed instantly. By no means did that mean you had survived the worst of the abuse; on the contrary, your hell was just starting. For a moment, you thought Paige was going to press her heel closer to the pole…you could hear your own ribs groaning under the pressure as you waited for them to rupture and your sides to unzip and release a red spray…. Instead, her foot swung forward again, taking you for the ride.

Copying down the number, Paige rolled her eyes as the message repeated the warning for the third time. She hung up, grumbling under her breath, “little shit wouldn’t be able to lay a hand on me anyway…” Paige had no idea how right she was. Flexing her toes, the giant Diva checked her email one last time and was about to stand up and get dressed when something caught her attention. It was slight…but, she could have sworn she felt something stuck…to her foot?

“THE HELL?” Paige’s voice boomed around you as the world began to shift once again. Slowly, the wall of flesh you’d been slammed by began to move forward. You screamed into her warm skin as your body slowly peeled off the cool metal pole before you stayed tight to her skin. You’d been hopeful Paige was just going to stand and walk out, but that hope flew out the window as you felt the incline of Paige’s foot growing steeper with each passing second! The incline began to increase further and all you could do was claw at Paige’s skin to keep your grip before…

Lifting her legs up and leaning forward, Paige flexed her toes and examined the back of her sandals, thinking she felt something back there (https://pics.wikifeet.com/Saraya-Jade-Be...). “What the hell is that?” Paige asked as…
115211.title: Run to the Poles...

1152111.content:
You held your breath as Paige’s titanic fingers began to fell about the back of her sandals. She was sure to find you if she kept moving her fingers about the way she was doing. Your heart almost stopped as you felt the lightest brush of Paige’s warm pale skin moving over your body second shivers all throughout it. This was it she had felt you, she was gonna find you and if she did you were so dead...if she saw you she’d turn you in, if she saw you but couldn’t figure out you’re human...you were even more screwed.

“Hmmm guess I was just imagining it.” Paige mused.

You were relieved as you saw her humongous fingers retract and vanish into the distance. Thank the heavens you weren’t caught. But now you were in kind of a predicament. Sure you weren’t found at all but you were still stuck to Paige’s foot and were hundreds of feet in the air (in reality less than a foot high), you didn’t fancy falling to your death especially at the size of a bug. There seemed to be only one option.l,you’d have to climb up and attempt to maneuver through Paige’s collossal toes and feet until you found your way down the ground again.

Taking a deep breath you climbed up the sander until you were right by Paige’s huge toes. Each one easily dwarfed you several times. You did however find the sight of her black nail polish cool but you’d have no time to enjoy it as you began your trek down the foot of Paige. Meanwhile...Paige had taken out her phone again and had made a call.

“Hey baby girl! How are you?...yeah I’m good just a little annoyed thst there’s some little pervert out there stalking us...yeah if I catch him I’ll beat him so bad he’ll wish he was never born...nah I’m just sat down chilling...yeahs come by if you want...yeah that sounds good babe...I’m see yes soon...(smooch sound effect)”

Paige finshed her call as you heard her sigh as stretched her legs and flexed her toes, a normal minor action for her but for you it was much much more. The slightest movement from her toes caused you to lose your footing, you screamed as you fell and barely managed to grab onto her toenail, this was truly terrifying. Panicking you tried to pull yourself up but it was to no avail as you were to exhausted from cloning her toes in the first place. You could feel the heat radiating off of Paige’s toes as your grip continued to loosen, this was it for real this time, you were about to fall and there was nothing you could do. A single tear dropped down your cheek as you finally lost your grip.

However Lady Luck would be on your side as just at that moment Paige moved her other foot so thst it was positioned just under her other as you fell meaning you fell onto this deus ex machina. As luck would have it you landed Inbetween Paige’s big and second toes, the good news was that you were alive. The bad news was that she then scrunched her toes together trapping you Inbetween these fleshy pillars.

Paige then lowered her feet down to the floor as the landed with a thud. She then walked over to her locker causing you to be smacked and thrown about between her toes, you could taste the sweat between the, as well with each movement, this is what you get for trying to get close to those women. You’re on the verge of being squished like an ant, goddamn those shrinking settings!

As Paige made her way over to her locker she tuned her head and smiled as her friend and former protege Mandy Rose walked in and approached her before embracing her.

“Hello darling good to see you!” Paige announced cheerfully.

“Hey babe! Oh man you look amazing today I love your outfit!”

“Oh this it’s nothing haha, thanks though. You don’t look half bad yourself.”

“Thanks Paige! Oh my god I love that Nail polish! I know I’m the golden goddess but black is my guilty pleasure. Mind if I take a pic so I can get the right shade?” Mandy asks.

“Sure baby girl go ahead.”

Mandy then crouches down and takes out her phone before taking a picture. Just as she took it though you managed to squeeze your way out from between Paige’s toes and tasted the sweet fresh air, however you were then blinded by a bright flash as Mandy took the picture.

Satisfied Mandy checks out the picture with a smile before it vanishes.

“What the hell is that...Paige I think you have something in between your toes...”

“Hmmm my toes? I did think there was something on my foot earlier...wonder if it’s that it” Paige answered as she checked Mandy’s phone...she then zooms in as much as she can on the pic before noticing the something in question between her toes. The pc was blurry though and Paige thought it was a________ between her toes.

1152322.content:
You had no time to gather your bearings as you tried to hide under the bench in the locker room. No sooner had you made it here had the sound of tremors began. BOOM. BOOM. BOOM! surprised you spun around instantly and found thst you were being stared at by a gigantic pair of red eyes...uh oh. You dared not to make a move as you didn’t know how a giant diva would react to a 2 inch tall man hiding in the women’s locker room. Playing it cool you attempted to stay still hoping she would think you were a toy or something else entirely.

“What in the hell?” Ember muttered.

“Crap crap crap!” Was all you could think to yourself as the eye lit up at the sight of you. What happened next took you completely by surprise.

“Hey there little guy!”

At the worst possible time your natural instincts kicked in and you answered her back with a friendly wave. “Fuck why did I do that!” You thought as you gave away your status as a real person. Ember meanwhile audibly gasped as she released thst you were indeed a real person. What she was thinking was unknow, hell what were you thinking? You should’ve made a run for it then and there but you didn’t and now had to face whatever consequences this giantess had in store for you.

“Oh my god you’re real! Holy shit I can’t belive it! Wow why are you so small? I mean how do you do anything at thst size?” Ember asked in amazement.

You didn’t answer this time and instead stood silent as a single bead of sweat dripped down your cheek, slowly you turned the other direction and tried to walk away, not even bothering to run.

“No wait little guy! I won’t hurt you!”

You stopped frozen in your tracks. What were you doing? Get out of there. Go find somewhere to hide until your shrink ray recharges so you can grow back to normal. But the sound of embers sweet concerned voice has an affect on you. You almost swoon as the concern this titanic beauty has for you is so pure and loving. You never expected to be this close to a wwe diva in your life and now here you were mere inches from a billboard sized face looking at you with such care. Throwing caution to the wind you turn around and walk slowly out from under the bench and towards Embers towering form.

“That’s it! One out from under there it’s not safe for a little guy like you!”

You did as she said and walked closer to the humongous Ember Moon who had lifted her face up from the ground but was still on her knees. She was in her ring gear minus her boots and was instead in a pair of flip flops. It certainly was a sight to see, the huge body of Ember was gorgeous, this was the reason you had shrunk yourself in the first place so you could get up close and personal with these women. But you had never expected this.

“Wow I can’t believe its a real tiny guy! Man this is like something from a video game! Are you a fairy or a sprite? Are you gonna help me find some cool unlockabes hihi!” Ember giggled.

It was nice she had taken your discovery in good spirits, you shuddered to think what would happen if she knew your true intentions...she’d probably crush you like a bug...snapping out of it you didn’t notice that ember had lowered her hand down in front of you.

“C’mon little guy it’s nit safe for you down there...why don’t you climb on and I can get a better look at you hihi!”

Accepting her invitation you meekly climb aboard her huge palm, you relies how lucky you are that you didn’t shrink yourself smaller than 2 inches as you’d most likely end up lost in the creases if her palm. Seeing you safely aboard her hand Ember lifted you up slowly although the jolt of movement didn’t stop you from losing you footing and clinging to one of fingers for dear life. After a few seconds you were uo high and staring back into the beautiful red eyes of Ember Moon.

“Hey little guy! This is such surreal experience, I mean it must be even crazier for you right? Giant people everywhere, giant feet that could step on you at any moment. Someone could’ve crushed you...had I not already...but anyway this is really cool, I mean you can be like my little sidekick.,,would you like that huh?” Ember asked.

This latest development took you by surprise, should you accept Embers offer of being her “little sidekick” for a while? It might be fun until you choos to unshrink yourself...assuming this technology actually does that...shit should’ve tested it out before shrinking yourself. Anyway in the end...

133.content:
“Hey! Oh my god, is th-” was all the young woman managed to say before a bright flash of light enveloped her and Jessamyn. The searing light sent thousands of tiny spots dancing across her field of vision while she was faintly aware of Jessamyn cursing from a surprising distance away. That was the first hint to Nicole that something was wrong aside from her lack of vision…Jessamyn had just been next to her a fraction of a second ago, why was she so far away now?! She wasn’t given long to think about it though before the second hint that something was wrong showed itself…the crackling of thunder in the distance that sounded almost like…laughter? But that made no se-

THOOOM! THOOOOOOM! THOOOOOOOOOM!....

Like Pharaoh counting plagues, Nicole found her third sign something was going terrible awry as the ground began to shudder and shake underfoot, knocking her to her ass while the distant thunderhead seemed to be growing louder and closer with each tremor that shook the ground! The swirling lights in front of Nicole’s eyes began to dissipate as she looked around and saw that there actually WAS some distance between her and Jessamyn…distance that was filled a split-second later a black, rubber wall with pink canvas stretched over it dropped out of the sky like Dorthy’s fucking house!

BABOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!

“OH. MY. GOD! IT ACTUALLY WORKED?! THAT’S SOOOO FUCKING HILARIOUS!” Dakota’s voice thundered as the newly risen giantess smirked at the pair of bug-sized women stranded alone on either side of her sneaker. “HEHE…SORRY, I WAS ONLY GOING FOR JESSAMYN…BUT I GUESS IT GETS EVERYONE IN ITS LINE OF SIGHT…GOOD TO KNOW!” Dakota chuckled, rising up to her full height as she realized there were now two toys she could enjoy breaking in today (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Djov3otUUAA4...). Looking back and forth, Dakota tried looking intimidating for just a moment before she burst out laughing…it was almost impossible for her to see the little bugs when she stood to her full height. Slowly squatting back over them again, the giantess grabbed Jessamyn between her fingers; the little one looked like she was going to shit herself as Dakota rose to her full height (giving Jessamyn plenty to feel sick about as her ears, no doubt, popped several times from the 5’6” wrestler suddenly skyrocketing to her full height once more) (https://66.media.tumblr.com/647a8da9f5a9...). The New Zealander smirked at the buff blonde struggling between her fingers as she broke out into a giggle that sent chills down both Jessamyn’s and Nicole’s spines.

Jessamyn tried her best to put on a brave front as she shouts, “D-Dakota! Ok, t-this isn’t funny anymore! Put me down and turn us back!”

“SORRY~ NOT HOW IT WORKS…I CAN MAKE YOU SMALLER AND SMALLER, BUT THAT’S IT…AND EVEN IF I COULD GROW YOU BACK, DON’T THINK I WANNA!”

“What?!” Jessamny shouted, her face going red.

Dakota just smirked as she giggled, “YEAH…I MEAN, REMEMBER WHAT YOU SAID ABOUT OUR NEXT MATCH?” Jessamny’s face suddenly went white as Dakota placed a finger against her chin and ‘thought’ about it for a moment before gasping, “THAT’S RIGHT! I THINK YOU SAID YOU’D UH…SQUISH ME? CALLED ME A MIDGET OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT, RIGHT?” Jessamyn couldn’t say a word as Dakota leaned in closer and whispered, “LET’S SEE WHO SQUISHES WHO NOW~ SOUND FUN?”

Even Dakota’s whisper overhead still rang like thunder in Nicole’s ears as the unfortunate fan actually did end up pissing herself after realizing what the NXT wrestler had done to her! Before even thinking of what she could do to get out of this situation, Nicole’s brain was over-ridden by her body as she turned on the ball of her foot and began bolting away from the massive wrestler’s sneaker before she ended up getting Dakota’s attention in the wrong way. All she had to do was run, she thought. If Nicole could make it to another room, maybe someone would be in there and she could get help! With her arms and legs pumping, the college freshman put every ounce of energy she had into fleeing…not yet noticing that even with her desperate drive, she’d barely gone a few inches away from Dakota’s sneakers in the time that the two wrestlers had exchanged their first few verbal jabs with one another….

“WHAT’S WRONG? YOU’RE SO QUIET NOW~ WE COULD THUMB-WRESTLE IF YOU WANT AS A WARM-UP! MAYBE YOU’LL BE ABLE TO BEAT A FINGER…SHOULD WE ASK YOUR CUTE LITTLE FAN?” Dakota asked, smirking as Jessamyn went even paler.

“Leave her out of this! S-She’s nice!” the tiny wrestler shouted, only to feel her skull rattle as Dakota giggled in response.

“IF SHE’S SO NICE, THEN I THINK SHE’D LOVE TO JUDGE FOR US! ISN’T THAT RIGHT, PIP…SQUEAK? WHERE’D SHE GO?” Dakota asked, looking down to see that the little bug wasn’t between her sneakers where it belonged. Dakota’s eyes flashed back to Jessamyn who quickly tore her gaze away from the floor. “HOLY SHIT! YOU’RE ACTUALLY TRYING TO LET HER GET AWAY? HAHAHA! THAT’S HILARIOUS! DO YOU THINK YOU’RE SOME KINDA LITTLE HEROINE OR SOMETHING? SAVING THE POOW WITTLE FAN FWOM THE BIG, BAD MONSTER? HMMMMMMMM~”

Jessamyn swallowed the baseball-sized lump in her throat as she choked, “D-Dakota! Come on, s-she’s got nothing to do with this! Just let her go and…a-and I’ll do whatever you want!”

“ANYTHING?” Dakota asked, raising an eyebrow.

“Yes!” Jessamyn shouted, feeling like she might be able to do something to at least get one person away from Dakota.

That wish was dismantled quickly as the giantess giggled and smirked wickedly, squeezing Jessamyn between her fingers a little while cooing, “YOU’RE THE SIZE OF A FUCKING ANT, BITCH. I ALREADY OWN YOUR TINY ASS~ NOW…WHERE’D YOUR LITTLE BUGGY FRIEND GO? OR SHOULD I JUST WALK TILL I SQUISH HER?” Dakota giggled and stuck out her tongue before running the fingers with Jessamyn between them through her hair…and letting go! The tiny woman was forced to grab onto the silky, brunette strands as Dakota giggles and bounced on the balls of her feet (https://i.makeagif.com/media/4-06-2019/q...). “FEE, FI, FO, FUM~ LOOK OUT, BUGGY…HERE I COME~”
